RainbruRPG::Terminal

RainbruRPG::Terminal Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

The namespace of the S-Lang API used by the server.

This namespace contains the S-Lang GUI API used by the server and some text-based tools. It declares TerminalApp, a Singleton that you must call. You can add a MenuBar and some Window to this Singleton.

In a Window, you can add some Widget based class. The events are function-pointer driven.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RainbruRPG::Terminal::tCaptionType

The type of a Caption instance.

Enumerator:
H_CENTERED  The text will be horizontally centered.
V_CENTERED  The text will be vertically centered.
HV_CENTERED  The text will be horizontally and vertically centered.
SCROLLED  The text can be scrolled.
WORD_WRAPPED  The text can stand in multiple lines.

Definition at line 39 of file caption.h.

enum RainbruRPG::Terminal::tListViewSelectionType

The ListView selection type.

Enumerator:
LVS_COLUMN  The user selects an entire column.
LVS_LINE  The user selects a line.
LVS_CELL  The user selects a cell.

Definition at line 47 of file listview.h.

enum RainbruRPG::Terminal::tWindowState

The state of a window.

Enumerator:
HIDDEN  The window is not visible.
NORMAL  No special flag has been set.
MINIMIZED  Only the title is visible.
MAXIMIZED  The window is fullscreen.

Definition at line 40 of file window.h.
